title: Quick chicken and mushroom pie
ingredients: ['olive oil, as needed for cooking', '1 onion, diced', '400g bonless chicken meat, diced', '1/2 punnet mushrooms, sliced', '2 medium leeks, sliced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'chopped fresh thyme, to taste', '1 heaped tablespoon plain flour', '500ml chicken stock', '1 sheet puff pastry', '1 egg, whisked (optional)']
